attributes.action: To hold a referendum on the EU 'Treaty' agreed to on the 23/06/2007.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To hold a referendum on the EU 'Treaty' agreed to on the 23/06/2007. To all intents and purpose this is the EU constitution rebadged as a treaty and the people of Great Britain are not being given the opportunity to vote on it. Surely the govenrment of the day have a responsibility to explain to the people why they believe this treaty is such a good thing, but most importantly they should put it to the people to decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
